pmweatherapi.configuration.use_original_: Disables all custom rendering and optimizations from PMWeatherAPI! Also disables all overlays and custom radar modes!
pmweatherapi.configuration.transparent_b: Only shows weather data, basically replaces black/terrain with transparency
pmweatherapi.configuration.darken_biomes: Darkens biomes by 50% before displaying on the radar. This option also makes it more noisier.
pmweatherapi.configuration.disable_custo: Disables all custom radar modes from rendering. Falls back to PMWeather for Reflectivity, Velocity, and IR. Any custom radar modes will not appear, but still be cycled through
pmweatherapi.configuration.disable_overl: Disables all overlays from rendering when client radar debugging is on
pmweatherapi.configuration.show_radar_mo: Enables an overlay to show the current radar mode's ID
pmweatherapi.configuration.radar_mode_id: Determines the side to render the Radar Mode ID Overlay. Does nothing if Show Radar Mode ID is off
commands.pmweatherapi.non_player: You must be a player to execute this command!
